descriptionNullable:
### Context
there are many factors which causes change in market, among them there is NEWS. 
Good news like rude in tax, some new policies, etc tend to have positive impact on market, while bad news like any disaster, political instability have a negative impact.





### Content

the dataset was provided by [icertis](https://www.icertis.com/?creative=247184258313&keyword=icertis&matchtype=e&network=g&device=c&icid=7011G000000KONnQAO&gclid=Cj0KCQjwt4X8BRCPARIsABmcnOoJiUGSrcyJrGTNcg1sCvOVlT7kmR0nWLpH_XioTunhJ5BF_ZFi7kAaAurPEALw_wcB) as campus recruitment process.
the datase contains:
**News_ID**: distinct news ID 
**Date**: date and time news was reported
**Headline**: news headlines
**Article**: the entire news
**Journalists**:
**market_change%**: percentage of market change during  reported news







### Acknowledgements

[icertis](https://www.icertis.com/?creative=247184258313&keyword=icertis&matchtype=e&network=g&device=c&icid=7011G000000KONnQAO&gclid=Cj0KCQjwt4X8BRCPARIsABmcnOoJiUGSrcyJrGTNcg1sCvOVlT7kmR0nWLpH_XioTunhJ5BF_ZFi7kAaAurPEALw_wcB)
title: News and market changes
subtitle: Effect of news on market
description:
### Context
there are many factors which causes change in market, among them there is NEWS. 
Good news like rude in tax, some new policies, etc tend to have positive impact on market, while bad news like any disaster, political instability have a negative impact.





### Content

the dataset was provided by [icertis](https://www.icertis.com/?creative=247184258313&keyword=icertis&matchtype=e&network=g&device=c&icid=7011G000000KONnQAO&gclid=Cj0KCQjwt4X8BRCPARIsABmcnOoJiUGSrcyJrGTNcg1sCvOVlT7kmR0nWLpH_XioTunhJ5BF_ZFi7kAaAurPEALw_wcB) as campus recruitment process.
the datase contains:
**News_ID**: distinct news ID 
**Date**: date and time news was reported
**Headline**: news headlines
**Article**: the entire news
**Journalists**:
**market_change%**: percentage of market change during  reported news







### Acknowledgements

[icertis](https://www.icertis.com/?creative=247184258313&keyword=icertis&matchtype=e&network=g&device=c&icid=7011G000000KONnQAO&gclid=Cj0KCQjwt4X8BRCPARIsABmcnOoJiUGSrcyJrGTNcg1sCvOVlT7kmR0nWLpH_XioTunhJ5BF_ZFi7kAaAurPEALw_wcB)
